feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a layout update affecting App.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light/dark modes using OKLCH colors.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the Tambola React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout combining last number display, controls, history panel, and number board in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/features/tambola/components: UI card with draw, undo, reset controls and auto‑draw toggle plus interval slider.
Displays called numbers in reverse order inside a scrollable card.
Shows the last drawn number or placeholder with completion message styling.
90‑number grid marking called numbers with highlighted gradient styling.
frontend/src/features/tambola/storage.ts: localStorage helpers and creators for initial game and auto‑draw state.
frontend/src/features/tambola/types.ts: Type definitions for Tambola game state, auto‑draw settings, and persisted state.
frontend/src/features/tambola/useTambola: React hook managing Tambola logic including draw, undo, reset, persistence, and auto‑draw timer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated/anonymous backend actors with React Query and identity updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables plus global styles including background pattern and dark mode palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, fonts, plugins, and theme extensions tied to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata and feature list for a Tambola number generator app.
